solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    private TreeNode prev = null;--newline--    --newline--    public void flatten(TreeNode root) {--newline--        if (root == null)--newline--            return;--newline--        flatten(root.right);--newline--        flatten(root.left);--newline--        root.right = prev;--newline--        root.left = null;--newline--        prev = root;--newline--    }--newline--}
